https://openminds.om-i.org/props/contras._instruction: Add the contrast agent(s) administered for this acquisition, including for each the agent identity and administered amount; if no contrast agent was used, leave this field null. Include all agents given prior to or during the scan.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/contras.label: Contrast agent
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/contras.name: contrastAgent

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/customP._instruction: Add any user-defined parameters grouped in context-specific sets that are not covered in the standardized properties of this activity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/customP.label: Custom property set
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/customP.name: customPropertySet

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip._instruction: Enter a description of this activity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.description: Longer statement or account giving the characteristics of someone or something.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.label: Description
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/descrip.name: description

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device._instruction: Add the magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) scanner used for this acquisition. This reference should identify the specific device configuration under which the scan was performed.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.description: Piece of equipment or mechanism (hardware) designed to serve a special purpose or perform a special function.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.label: Device
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/device.name: device

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/distort._instruction: Add the distortion correction data used for this acquisition, linking to the calibration files applied during image reconstruction or post-processing. If no distortion correction was performed, leave this field null.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/distort.label: Distortion correction
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/distort.name: distortionCorrection

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endTime._instruction: Enter the date and/or time on when this activity ended, formatted as either '2023-02-07T16:00:00+00:00' (date-time) or '16:00:00+00:00' (time).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endTime.label: End time
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/endTime.name: endTime

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input._instruction: Add the specimen (subject or tissue sample) in the physical and biological state in which it was scanned, referencing the corresponding specimen record at the time of imaging.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.description: Something or someone that is put into or participates in a process or machine.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.label: Input
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/input.name: input

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO._instruction: Add the dataset version in which this activity was conducted.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.description: Reference to the ensemble of multiple things or beings.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.label: Is part of
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/isPartO.name: isPartOf

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL._instruction: Enter a lookup label for this activity that may help you to find this instance more easily.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.label: Lookup label
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/lookupL.name: lookupLabel

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/motionC._instruction: Add the motion correction data used for this acquisition, linking to the calibration files or reference images applied during image reconstruction or post-processing. If no motion correction was performed, leave this field null.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/motionC.label: Motion correction
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/motionC.name: motionCorrection

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/output._instruction: Add the output data generated by this acquisition by linking to one or more files containing the primary imaging outputs and/or, if applicable, any secondary reconstructed or corrected outputs produced during post-processing.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/output.description: Something or someone that comes out of, is delivered or produced by a process or machine.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/output.label: Output
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/output.name: output

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/perform._instruction: Add all agents that performed this activity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/perform.label: Performed by
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/perform.name: performedBy

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/prepara._instruction: Add the initial preparation type for this activity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/prepara.label: Preparation design
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/prepara.name: preparationDesign

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/protoco._instruction: Add all protocols used during this activity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/protoco.description: Plan that describes the process of a scientific or medical experiment, treatment, or procedure.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/protoco.label: Protocol
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/protoco.name: protocol

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/registr._instruction: Add the registration data used for this acquisition, linking to the transformation and/or reference files applied during image alignment in post-processing. If no registration was performed, leave this field null.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/registr.label: Registration data
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/registr.name: registrationData

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specime._instruction: Add the specimen orientation as the anatomical directions corresponding to the scanner X, Y, and Z axes, describing the alignment of the specimen's anatomy with the scanner coordinate system. Note that this orientation may differ from the prescribed slice orientation, especially in nonstandard specimen positioning.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specime.label: Specimen orientation
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/specime.name: specimenOrientation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startTi._instruction: Enter the date and/or time on when this activity started, formatted as either '2023-02-07T16:00:00+00:00' (date-time) or '16:00:00+00:00' (time).
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startTi.label: Start time
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/startTi.name: startTime

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studyTa._instruction: Add all study targets of this activity.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studyTa.description: Structure or function that was targeted within a study.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studyTa.label: Study target
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/studyTa.name: studyTarget

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/targetA._instruction: Add the target anatomy, indicating the primary anatomical structure or region intended to be imaged in this acquisition. This field describes the imaging objective (for example, organ, tissue, or structure) and may be derived from the acquisition protocol description.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/targetA.label: Target anatomy
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/targetA.name: targetAnatomy
